sentences.en: That must be the oval unroofed amphitheater in Rome. It was basically a stadium with comprehensive functions.

sentences.en: The amphitheater was a sealed off round structure . Swordplay, wresting, gladiatoral and other contests were held there.

sentences.en: The spectators in the amphitheater cheered the gladiators.
